mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message_tb(message_no, message_content, message_time, message_delete, message_sender, chatroom_no) VALUES (message_no_seq.nextval, #{messageContent}, #{messageTime}, 'N', #{messageSender}, #{chatroomNo})
INSERT INTO chatroom_user_tb(chatroom_user_no, chatroom_no, chat_user_no) VALUES (chatroom_user_no_seq.nextval, #{roomNo}, #{userNo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM chatroom_user_tb WHERE chatroom_no = #{roomNo} AND chat_user_no = #{userNo}
